subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: The project aims to further contribute to effective promotion and protection of human rights in Georgia by a fully functional, independent national human rights institution – Public Defender’s Office (PDO). The output will be increased overall capacity and expanded geographical outreach of the PDO, as well as improved public awareness on human rights and their protection. The achievement of the output will be ensured through the following major activities: Enhancing PDO monitoring capacities; Assisting the PDO in carrying out its civic education functions; Strengthening Regional Offices/Resource Centres; Supporting the Tolerance Centre within the Public Defender’s Office.
subproject.title: Support to PDO Centers

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of national human rights institutions

subproject.description:
Enhanced protection of the human rights for Persons with Disabilities (PwD)				
and supporting enabling environment for provision of better services to them
subproject.title: Project on PwDs
